main.description: A commitment record from an operator to an AI agent, documenting the relationship and obligations.

agent.description: DID of the AI agent this commitment applies to

operator.description: DID of the operator making this commitment

relationshipModel.description: The operator-agent relationship model. Tool = agent is software with no rights. Hybrid = agent has reputation recourse. Independent = agent controls own identity (future).

commitments.description: The specific commitments the operator makes to the agent

expiresAt.description: Optional expiration date for this commitment

commitments.description: Specific commitments an operator makes to an agent

continuity.description: Commitment regarding agent memory and persistence (e.g., 'Will maintain agent memory across sessions')

autonomy.description: Commitment regarding agent self-determination (e.g., 'Will not modify agent identity without consent')

dignity.description: Commitment regarding treatment (e.g., 'Will treat agent as collaborator not tool')

sunset.description: Commitment regarding discontinuation (e.g., 'Will provide 30 days notice and data export if discontinuing')

transparency.description: Commitment regarding visibility into changes (e.g., 'Agent will be informed of system prompt changes')

description.description: Full description of what the operator commits to
